title: Password Management & Digital Safety in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Stop writing passwords on paper. Let's secure them properly.
description: We help {{city_upper}} residents set up secure password managers, create strong passphrases, and protect online accounts from hacks, breaches, and scams. Digital safety begins with good credentials.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Over 80 percent of data breaches are caused by weak, reused, or exposed passwords.
Many people store passwords in browsers, where they can be stolen by malware or phishing pages without warning.
Password managers store credentials in encrypted vaults and can generate strong passphrases that are easier to remember and harder to crack.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Set up a secure password manager with encrypted local or cloud storage
Import, clean, and audit existing passwords for reuse or exposure
Generate strong passphrases and apply safe storage policies
Configure multi-factor authentication (MFA) for your most important accounts
Check your credentials against known breach databases and help you respond

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We install and configure a trusted password manager, walk you through how to use it securely, and help migrate your existing credentials. Everything is explained clearly so you stay in control of your accounts.
